alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 3:24PM CDT until June 15 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Southeastern Houston County in southeastern Alabama... Northern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 323 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cowarts to 8 miles east of Florala, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Geneva, Marianna, Chipley, Graceville, Dothan, Hartford, Taylor, Ashford, Slocomb, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Malone, Malvern, Rehobeth, Cottondale and Greenwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
